data.title: AvePoint: Strong SaaS ARR Momentum and Strategic Investment Underpinning Long-Term Growth to $1B ARR
data.description:
William Blair analyst Jason Ader has maintained their bullish stance on AVPT stock, giving a Buy rating today.

Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Jason Ader has given his Buy rating due to a combination of factors, including AvePoint’s strong execution and attractive long‑term growth profile. He highlights robust SaaS-driven ARR expansion, broad-based geographic strength, and accelerating net new ARR, all underpinned by resilient retention metrics and growing channel contributions from MSP partners.

He also underscores management’s confident 2026 outlook, with revenue and ARR guidance ahead of Street expectations even after normalizing for M&A effects. While margins will dip modestly as 2026 is framed as an investment year, he views this as a deliberate trade-off to support the multiyear path toward $1 billion in ARR and to deepen AvePoint’s position in mission-critical data governance, protection, and compliance as enterprises scale AI initiatives.

Ader covers the Technology sector, focusing on stocks such as Pure Storage, MongoDB, and JFrog. According to TipRanks, Ader has an average return of -2.9% and a 40.30% success rate on recommended stocks.

In another report released today, DBS also maintained a Buy rating on the stock with a S$20.00 price target.
data.author: TipRanks Auto-Generated Intelligence Newsdesk
